content.body: Dominic Farolino: also, maybe you could elaborate a bit on your plan as not all the PRs seem ready. How are we not going to end up with an inconsistent state?
content.formatted_body: Dominic Farolino: also, maybe you could elaborate a bit on your plan as not all the PRs seem ready. How are we not going to end up with an inconsistent state?

content.body: some of the PRs define the same concept about how to find the association between option and select elements i think, but i can easily resolve those merge conflicts
i split up the PRs as best i could to make them independent to make them easier to review
i am confident there wont be an inconsistent state
would it help for me to merge them all together into a separate mega PR?
I think it's fine to keep them separate, though if they have conflicts that will present some issues.
bakkot: it's happening: https://github.com/whatwg/html/pull/11143 (first real Float16Array dep I'm aware of and the OG use case)
